name: BeetWarden
description: A password manager built with Convex on the backend, Next.js and Mantine.dev.

name: Drafting Portfolio
description: A portfolio that shows images and blueprints. Built with Next.js and styled with Mantine.dev.

name: Trash Panda
description: An application to help people notify other users on a map about their discarded but still useful furniture, in an effort to reduce the amount of garbage in the city of Montreal.

name: Point Of Sale
description: A point of sale application for a pharmacy in Panama, built with React, Bootstrap and Bulma.
